issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
Hi All, 

I am facing one issue after integrating the module which contains the framework. The application is working perfectly fine while running it on Simulator but we are getting the following error while doing the ad-hoc distribution. 

I have created the framework  and Appcelerator module framework on the same machine

[INFO]  Invoking xcodebuild
[ERROR] ** ARCHIVE FAILED **
[ERROR] The following build commands failed:
[ERROR]         Ld /Users/mindstix/Documents/Appcelerator_Studio_Workspace/Speech/build/iphone/build/Intermediates/Speech.build/Release-iphoneos/Speech.build/Objects-normal/armv7/Speech normal armv7
[ERROR] (1 failure)
fields.summary: Unable to package application after integrating the  module contains framework

comments.body: Hi [~prashantj], Thanks for reporting this issue. Do you still experience the error? If yes, please share complete log. Also share your working environment details and sample test code that regenerates the error. Let us know the update.

Hello,
 We haven't heard back from you since our last response. I am just following up to check the status of this case and if you need further help on it.

Hello, Make sure you have a valid provision profile. Try creating a new one and then try packaging. Also, were your app thinning enabled in the app? Try disabling it and try packaging. Let us know the update of the issue. Thanks.

Hello!

Hope you are doing fine today.
Would you please reply us regarding previous reviews? We are looking forward to your response.
